definition[0]: towards the bottom of a hill or towards lower land
example[0]: I was going downhill and my brakes failed.
definition[1]: on a slope that goes down to a lower point
example[2]: It’s a long walk back, but at least it’s all downhill.
definition[2]: if something that was successful is going downhill, it is starting to fail, and is getting gradually worse
example[3]: Sales had peaked in 2005 at $3.8 million but had gone steadily downhill.
